name: pleaser
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who tries hard to make people happy or to make people like them: David is a pleaser. It's not enough that he's happy. He wants everybody around him to be happy too.
something that people enjoy: The show is expected to be an audience pleaser. See also
crowd-pleaser
